game.name: Dungeons & Warbands
game.shortDescription: A fast turn-based, grid-based hack and slash Dungeon Crawler in an Open World with many towns, caves, and dungeons to visit or raid. Go solo or lead your warband of allies or monsters. Engage in brutal combat with realistic armor layers protecting against crippling body part damage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast turn-based, grid-based hack and slash Dungeon Crawler in an Open World with many towns, caves, and dungeons to visit or raid. Go solo or lead your warband of allies or monsters. Engage in brutal combat with realistic armor layers protecting against crippling body part damage.
